description: The resource schema to create a CodeArtifact package group.

Tag.description: A key-value pair to associate with a resource.

Key.description: The key name of the tag. You can specify a value that is 1 to 128 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.
Key.markdownDescription:
The key name of the tag. You can specify a value that is 1 to 128 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -. 

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 128  
Update requires: No interruption

Value.description: The value for the tag. You can specify a value that is 1 to 256 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.
Value.markdownDescription:
The value for the tag. You can specify a value that is 1 to 256 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -. 

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 256  
Update requires: No interruption

Tag.markdownDescription:
A key-value pair to associate with a resource.

---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

Restrictions.description: The origin configuration that is applied to the package group.
Restrictions.markdownDescription:
The origin configuration that is applied to the package group.

---

Required: Yes  
Update requires: No interruption

OriginConfiguration.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

Publish.description: The publish restriction determines if new package versions can be published.
Publish.markdownDescription:
The publish restriction determines if new package versions can be published.

---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

ExternalUpstream.description: The external upstream restriction determines if new package versions can be ingested or retained from external connections.
ExternalUpstream.markdownDescription:
The external upstream restriction determines if new package versions can be ingested or retained from external connections.

---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

InternalUpstream.description: The internal upstream restriction determines if new package versions can be ingested or retained from upstream repositories.
InternalUpstream.markdownDescription:
The internal upstream restriction determines if new package versions can be ingested or retained from upstream repositories.

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: ALLOW | BLOCK | ALLOW_SPECIFIC_REPOSITORIES | INHERIT  
Update requires: No interruption

items.markdownDescription:

Type: String  
Update requires: No interruption

DomainName.description: The name of the domain that contains the package group.
DomainName.markdownDescription:
The name of the domain that contains the package group.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 2  
Maximum Length: 50  
Pattern: ^([a-z][a-z0-9\-]{0,48}[a-z0-9])$  
Update requires: Replacement

DomainOwner.description: The 12-digit account ID of the AWS account that owns the domain.
DomainOwner.markdownDescription:
The 12-digit account ID of the AWS account that owns the domain.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Pattern: [0-9]{12}  
Update requires: No interruption

Pattern.description: The package group pattern that is used to gather packages.
Pattern.markdownDescription:
The package group pattern that is used to gather packages.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 2  
Maximum Length: 520  
Update requires: Replacement

ContactInfo.markdownDescription:
